Techs.Title: HTML 5
Techs.Desc: HTML5 is used for the 'Structure' of the house. This is used the build the outside of the app, the frame.

Techs.Title: CSS 3
Techs.Desc: CSS3 is used to 'Design' the house. The inside and outs of Easy Eats. The colors, style, template etc.

Techs.Title: Javascript
Techs.Desc: Javascript is used for the 'Plumbing' of the house. Flic a light switch, on comes the power. You register a user, users created.

Techs.Title: MongoDB
Techs.Desc: MongoDB is where the users information is stored. This allows the application to apply a login / register form and hold information.

Techs.Title: ExpressJS
Techs.Desc: ExpressJS is used to carry 'Variables' over easily from function to function. This allows for personal 'Shout Outs' to the user.

Techs.Title: AngularJS
Techs.Desc: AngularJS is used to 'Loop' through content with ease. Read JSON files and extract the needed information.

Techs.Title: NodeJS
Techs.Desc: NodeJS is the 'Back-Bone' of the opperation. Everything is compiled in NodeJs, routes, views, partials etc.
